author: Kamal Ali and Michael J. Pazzani
title: Error Reduction through Learning Multiple Descriptions
window: also experienced significant reduction with the error being halved (for DNA this represented an increase in accuracy from 67.9% to 86.8%!). The error reduction is least for the noisy KRK and LED data sets and for the presumably noisy medical diagnosis data sets. Eighty percent of the data sets which scored unimpressive error ratios (above 0.8) were noisy data sets. This finding is further explored
